sentences.en: A simple keyhole mounting system allows effortlessly quick wall installation.
sentences.cn: 简易的锁眼安装系统,确保简便易行.

sentences.en: A thread of light emerged from the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 从钥匙孔透出一线亮光.

sentences.en: He likes to listen at the keyhole of others.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢把耳朵贴在别人家的钥匙孔上听.

sentences.en: His eyes were glued to the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛紧贴在钥匙孔上.

sentences.en: I peeped through the keyhole and watched them.
I took a peep through the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 我从钥匙孔偷看了一眼.

sentences.en: Quasi - keyhole arc welding process is a typical nonlinear system.
sentences.cn: 准小孔弧焊接过程是个典型的非线性系统.
她从锁孔里偷看了一眼.

sentences.en: The boy peeped through the keyhole to see what was going on inside.
sentences.cn: 男孩从钥匙孔里窥视,看里面发生什么情况.

sentences.en: The drunken fellow was fumbling at the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 那个醉汉在摸索钥匙孔.

sentences.en: The landlady looked through the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 女老板巴着门上的钥匙孔儿,往屋里看去.

sentences.en: They caught him peeking in through the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 他们发现他从钥匙孔里向里窥视.

sentences.en: We caught her peeping through the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 她从锁孔偷看时，被我们撞着了。

phrases.tran_cn: [医]洞眼手术（等于小切口手术）

trans.tran_en: the hole in a lock that you put the key in
